thread.title: Portland Metro Tuesday Traffic: Crash I-205 north at Glisan
thread.title_full: Portland Metro Tuesday Traffic: Crash I-205 north at Glisan | OregonLive.com

author: Rosemarie Stein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Metro Tuesday Traffic: Crash I-205 north at Glisan
text:
Daily traffic » All traffic news » PDX Traffic Alerts on Twitter » Elliot Njus's Hard Drive blog » All weather news » School closures/delays
Most drivers, walkers, bikers and transit riders will see at least some mist or drizzle this morning as they make their way to their final destinations. Clouds will hang out most of the morning and many streets are wet. Read: possibly slick. Leave yourself some extra stopping room.
U.S. 26 NEAR THE ZOO 8:38 a.m.; Crash blocks the left lane westbound U.S. 26 between the tunnel and the zoo. Traffic backing to I-405. CLEARED TO SHOULDER.
***
OREGON CITY 8:24 a.m.; Crash reported on Highway 213 and Henrici Road.
***
I-205 North at Glisan ODOT I-205 NORTH AT GLISAN 8:08 a.m.; Two crashes near I-84 interchange, and Stark and Glisan on I-205 north. Backing up traffic for miles.
***
GLADSTONE 8:06 a.m.; Crash blocking the left emergency lane I-205 northbound at the Gladstone exit.
***
NEWBERG 7:26 a.m.; Crash on OR 219 north of Newberg has the road closed on Bald Peak. Choose an alternate route.
***
Grabhorn Road closed in Aloha Google maps UPDATE ALOHA 8 a.m.; New crash or possibly same one, on Southwest Grabhorn Road. This one at Gassner Road. ALL LANES OPEN.
***
99W in DUNDEE tonight; Beam placement for the Newberg-Dundee bypass over OR 99W on the southwest side of Dundee continues tonight 11 p.m.- 4 a.m. Travelers should expect periodic 20 minute closures, with no detours. Avoid the area, consider an alternative route or expect delays.
***
UPDATE FAIRVIEW/TROUTDALE 7:50 a.m.; Crash blocks the right and center lanes westbound on I-84 at the 238th Street exit. Expect slowing in both directions. ALL LANES CLEARED.
***
UPDATE EAST VANCOUVER 7 a.m.; Car fire on the ramp from I-205 northbound to SR 500. Right lane blocked. CLEARED.
***
ALOHA 6:25 a.m.; Injury two-car crash reported on Southwest Farmington Road at Grabhorn Road.
***
Reminder that the Broadway Bridge is still closed to motor vehicle traffic. The closure - for painting - extends to Oct. 27. Walkers and bikers can still use the sidewalks on the bridge, but cars and buses are detouring.
Check back throughout the morning for the latest commuting updates and follow us on Twitter: @trafficportland
#pdxtraffic Tweets Find you full Portland-area traffic report here. (The Oregonian file photo) Heidi Williams | The Oregonian/OregonLive
